definition: to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
until/(used in combination with words like 到[dao4] or 至[zhi4] in constructs of the form 到...為止|到...为止)
to close/to stop/to put a stop to sth/cut-off point/stopping point/deadline
to curb/to put a stop to/to stop/to check/to limit
to cease/to suspend/to break off/to stop/to discontinue
to repeal (a law)/to put an end to/abolition/annulled
to halt/to stop/to go no farther

sentences.english: Does old people stop with agent of mist of Yunnan Baiyao gas what side effect does arthralgia have?
sentences.chinese: 老年人用云南白药气雾剂止关节痛有什么副作用？

sentences.english: Stop headachy Chinese traditional medicine recipe?
sentences.chinese: 有没有止头痛的中药配方？

sentences.english: Drigung monastery is on a steep hill, overlooking our camp.
sentences.chinese: 止贡寺位于陡峭的山上，俯视着我们的营地。

sentences.english: Water never stops, it's always flowing.
sentences.chinese: 河水永不止，永远向前走。

sentences.english: At the end of last month, it had 7 projects for pre-sales.
sentences.chinese: 截至上月底止，集团有7个项目可预售。

sentences.english: The Bark Control Collar effectively and humanely stops all barking when it is worn.
sentences.chinese: 只有在佩戴止吠项圈时，它才会有效的阻止狗狗吠叫。

sentences.english: Then dry off and apply the antiperspirant of your choice.
sentences.chinese: 然后擦干和运用您所选择的止汗。

sentences.english: We readjust our price according to the international markets.
sentences.chinese: 人们是根据世界市场的止情来调零价格的。

sentences.english: This will still the pain of the wound.
I think you need a shot to relieve the pain first.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你应该先打一针止止疼。

sentences.english: Segmental thrust ring absorbs all the thrust applied by internal pressure.
sentences.chinese: 弧形止推环吸收内部压力施加的全部推力。

sentences.english: The discretion that the court has in a foreclosure proceeding is fairly limited, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 法庭的处理权在止赎案的过程中有相当的局限。

sentences.english: Broadway and its plays and theaters, Connegie Hall for the best in the performing arts.
sentences.chinese: 百老汇的剧目，止耐基大厅最优秀的艺术表演。

sentences.english: We’re also seeing the reverberations of this crisis with the rise in foreclosures.
sentences.chinese: 这场危机仍然余波未了，房屋止赎数量还在上升。

sentences.english: Antispasmodics are used to treat abdominal pain by relieving the spasms in the muscles of the intestines.
sentences.chinese: 止痉挛药是借着减轻小肠肌肉抽筋而得以治疗腹痛。

sentences.english: And then the Brake is still.

definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
to be limited to/to be confined to
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
